entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 a.m. MST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.6Â°C

Observed at: Rock River 5:00 AM MST Friday 14 April 2023
Temperature: -17.6°C

Humidity: 74 %

Wind: NNW 10 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains late this evening and overnight. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
